sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="actuate()">left</button>
  <button>center</button>
  <button>right</button>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'
export default {
  name: 'ControlPad',
  data: function () {
    return {
      direction: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    actuate: function (direction) {
      axios.post('http://' + window.location.hostname + ':8000/actuate', { params: { direction: this.direction } })
        .then(response => this.responseData = response.data)
    }
  }
}
</script>
